Record.ClassificationPath: Findings_and_Disorders_Kind/Disease, Disorder or Finding/Disease or Disorder/Disorder by Site/Skin Disorder/Cutaneous Precancerous Condition/Precancerous Melanosis
Record.Description: A melanoma of the skin. It is characterized by the presence of melanoma cells in the dermal-epidermal junction only, without infiltration of the papillary or reticular dermis.
